means: 社会上高尚文雅行为的标准

sentence.Network_en: Nobody had the decency to inform me of what was planned.
sentence.Network_cn: 竟然没有一个人最起码地通知我一声计划了些什么。

sentence.Network_en: His sense of decency forced him to resign.
sentence.Network_cn: 他顾及颜面，不得不辞了职。

sentence.Network_en: Her behaviour showed a total lack of common decency .
sentence.Network_cn: 她的举止显示她连起码的礼节都不懂。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'appropriateness, fitness'): from Latin decentia, from decent- 'being fitting' (see decent)

entry.tran: 合宜;得体;正派;合乎礼仪
entry.def: Decency is the quality of following accepted moral standards.

example.ex: Unfortunately, on Friday night he showed neither decency nor dignity...
example.tran: 不幸的是，周五晚上他表现得既不得体，也不庄重。

example.ex: His sense of decency forced him to resign.
example.tran: 他顾及颜面，不得不辞了职。

entry.def: If you say that someone did not have the decency to do something, you are criticizing them because there was a particular action which they did not do but which you believe they ought to have done.

example.ex: Nobody had the decency to inform me of what was planned.
example.tran: 竟然没有一个人最起码地通知我一声计划了些什么。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of conforming to standards of propriety and morality
2. the quality of being polite and respectable

auth_sentence.content: She was murdered by devils without any form of decency.
auth_sentence.res_content: She was murdered by devils without any form of decency.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She was murdered by devils without any form of decency.

auth_sentence.content: But the basic rules of respect and human decency still apply.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the basic rules of respect and human decency still apply.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the basic rules of respect and human decency still apply.

auth_sentence.content: "Kindness and decency are creeping in," he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: "Kindness and decency are creeping in," he said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "Kindness and decency are creeping in," he said.

sentences.en: His sense of decency and fair play made him refuse the offer.
sentences.cn: 他的正直感和公平竞争意识使他拒绝了这一提议。

sentences.en: A journalist should always live up to the ideals of truth, decency, and justice.
sentences.cn: 记者必须始终践行真实、正直、正义的理想。

means.word_mean: 社会上高尚文雅行为的标准,礼仪

sentences.en: Governments are often drawn into disputes about matters of public taste and decency.
sentences.cn: 政府经常被拉入到有关公众品位和社会风化问题的争论中。
